Class TextureLoaderStore

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Textures
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Handles the parsing of image data from standard image formats into TextureUploads ready for GPU consumption.

public class TextureLoaderStore : IResourceStore<TextureUpload>, IDisposable
